BackstoryDef.title: alchemist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has seen [PAWN_possessive] fair share of work concocting curative elixirs. Though [PAWN_pronoun] is undoubtedly highly competent at [PAWN_possessive] trade, able to balance the active components of medicines and herbs, [PAWN_possessive] lack of social grace has caused friction within the medical community.

BackstoryDef.title: pharmacist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] focused on medicine development and synthesis, enhancing the preventative capabilities of [PAWN_possessive] sect. [PAWN_possessive] studies and practical experience has taught [PAWN_objective] how to compound and administer various remedies, depending on the patient.

BackstoryDef.title: tea master
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an heir of the Yaoma tea making tradition, carrying on the heritage of generations before [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_possessive] reputation arose from [PAWN_possessive] masterful selection and preparation of tea, as well as from [PAWN_possessive] ability to set the atmosphere.

BackstoryDef.title: tea farmer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: An expert with the evolutionary descendants of Camellia sinensis, [PAWN_nameDef] made a living off of growing, picking, and preparing tea leaves. [PAWN_possessive] understanding of the tea’s characteristics, along with their own selective breeding of the plant for a variety of purposes and conditions, helped the Yaoma spread their brand of tea to humanity.

BackstoryDef.title: herb cultivator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the caretaker of several species of rare flora, often at the request of many alchemists. Growing these medicinally potent plants optimally required [PAWN_objective] to replicate the specific environments each came from, from soil composition to climate, requiring not only botanical but also geological knowledge.

BackstoryDef.title: jadecarver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After passing the stringent occupational exams, dedicating years of practice to the tools of the trade and the properties of the gem itself, [PAWN_nameDef] was recognized as a professional jade craftsman. [PAWN_possessive] works are emblematic of Yaoma gemcutting, polishing and carving the viridescent gem into fantastical creatures as well as stately ornaments.

BackstoryDef.title: wushu competitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] demonstrated [PAWN_possessive] skill in competitive martial arts by taking part in tournaments. While [PAWN_possessive] proficiency in martial arts has risen with each match, so have the concussive effects of each of [PAWN_possessive] injuries.

BackstoryDef.title: wushu performer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: More a dancer than a fighter, [PAWN_nameDef] trained to obtain the fitness and flexibility required to perform [PAWN_possessive] martial art routines. Seamlessly transitioning between forms, [PAWN_possessive] synchronized movements have earned [PAWN_objective] technical marks and the crowd’s appreciation.

BackstoryDef.title: silkweaver
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has earned the right to professionally work the Yaoma’s silks, a family of fabrics refined by material science, genetic engineering, and selective breeding. From working the thread into bolts to embroidering brilliant patterns, [PAWN_possessive] tailored and decorated garments that attracted a discerning clientele.

BackstoryDef.title: exchange teacher
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has earned the right to professionally work the Yaoma’s silks, a family of fabrics refined by material science, genetic engineering, and selective breeding. From working the thread into bolts to embroidering brilliant patterns, [PAWN_possessive] tailored and decorated garments that attracted a discerning clientele.

BackstoryDef.title: enchantress
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: By night, [PAWN_nameDef] tantalized [PAWN_possessive] guests with song and dance, wrapping them around [PAWN_possessive] fingers. By day, [PAWN_pronoun] recorded and organized the information [PAWN_pronoun] gathered from [PAWN_possessive] clientele. These responsibilities isolated [PAWN_nameDef] from manual labor.

BackstoryDef.title: soothsayer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was known in [PAWN_possessive] sect for reading omens through an altered state of mind. Imbibing wisps of psychoactive incense, which [PAWN_pronoun] made [PAWN_objective] with [PAWN_possessive] own herbs, [PAWN_possessive] subconscious and conscious mind made predictions of the future.

BackstoryDef.title: calligraphist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With a flourish of [PAWN_possessive] brush, [PAWN_nameDef] precisely conveyed character and tone in the letters [PAWN_pronoun] wrote. [PAWN_possessive] works were appreciated by many Yaoma, from advertisers to store owners, and [PAWN_possessive] poetry highlighted a range of topics.

BackstoryDef.title: ink maker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] supported Yaoma calligraphy by producing the ink for its practice. Taking into account its use case, [PAWN_pronoun] compounded materials sourced from animals, plants, and rocks, relying on their chemical composition to create the ideal writing medium.

BackstoryDef.title: disciplinary officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] enforced law and order in [PAWN_possessive] sect with [PAWN_possessive] sword-arm and commanding voice. [PAWN_pronoun] resolved disputes between disciples and took part in internal investigations, both of which required [PAWN_objective] to be equally diplomatic and menacing.

BackstoryDef.title: daoscholar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Few have interacted with the Dao Canon as much as [PAWN_nameDef], with the sheer sum of study [PAWN_pronoun] has conducted. [PAWN_possessive] academic contribution to the Dao, whether from proprietary research or rigorous analysis, has furthered the evolution of Yaoma technology and sorceries.

BackstoryDef.title: aquaculturist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Working in cooperation with farmers, [PAWN_nameDef] ensured bountiful food production with Yaoma aquaponic and aquacultural agriculture. [PAWN_possessive] extensive knowledge of fish and produce ensured the Yaoma could continually grow crops, through the proper caretaking of fish and other aquatic life.

BackstoryDef.title: shrine keeper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served [PAWN_possessive] local sect by tending to a shrine, which many Yaoma visited. Besides maintaining the building’s structure and decorations, [PAWN_pronoun] led services for worshiping deified immortals and family ancestors, imbuing visitors with [PAWN_possessive] blessings on behalf of the divine.

BackstoryDef.title: reliquary watch
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A silent observer of an immortal’s final resting place, [PAWN_nameDef] maintains the earthly remains of deified figures. [PAWN_pronoun] repairs any damage to the mausoleum itself and the relics it contains, keeping a detailed record of the tomb shrine’s state. In this way, [PAWN_pronoun] preserved the dignity and knowledge of [PAWN_possessive] sect’s ancestors.

BackstoryDef.title: legacy seeker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [Pawn_nameDef] was a traveler of faraway places, intent on advancing the Dao Canon with the wisdom of long-dead immortals. [PAWN_possessive] journeys have taken [PAWN_objective] through civilization and wilderness, meeting friend and foe alike. When [PAWN_pronoun] reached [PAWN_possesive] intended destination, [PAWN_pronoun] paid her respects before returning home to share [PAWN_possessive] learnings.

BackstoryDef.title: sect foreman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [Pawn_nameDef] was a traveler of faraway places, intent on advancing the Dao Canon with the wisdom of long-dead immortals. [PAWN_possessive] journeys have taken [PAWN_objective] through civilization and wilderness, meeting friend and foe alike. When [PAWN_pronoun] reached [PAWN_possesive] intended destination, [PAWN_pronoun] paid her respects before returning home to share [PAWN_possessive] learnings.

BackstoryDef.title: hermit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the Yaoma who sought wisdom in the wilderness. Without contact with others, [PAWN_pronoun] was free to focus on [PAWN_objective]self and eke out a living among the verdant greenery and bountiful fauna. Eventually, [PAWN_pronoun] returned to civilization with a honed wisdom, but not the eloquence to share it.

BackstoryDef.title: wandering doctor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From the moment [PAWN_pronoun] picked up a blade, [PAWN_nameDef] knew it was not for [PAWN_objective]. But treating the wounds left on man and beast were, and so [PAWN_pronoun] exchanged [PAWN_possessive] sword for medicine and sutures. Through [PAWN_possessive] journeys from world to world, [PAWN_nameDef] polished both wit and healing, earning rare acclaim from the Yaoma sects [PAWN_pronoun] visited.

BackstoryDef.title: spelunker
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Despite [PAWN_possesive] superstitions of the underworld, [PAWN_nameDef] delved into the earth for ore and riches. Through [PAWN_possessive] forays into the depths, [PAWN_pronoun] learned where and how to quarry effectively, without risking [PAWN_possessive] safety. Because of [PAWN_possessive] deliberate, cautious steps, [PAWN_nameDef] has managed to stay alive.

BackstoryDef.title: zither player
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Well attuned with harmony and melody, [PAWN_nameDef] made a living stirring hearts with [PAWN_possessive] zither. In many Yaoma concert halls, [PAWN_pronoun] captivated [PAWN_possessive] audience with the scenery [PAWN_pronoun] evoked: at one moment, [PAWN_possessive] tune could be reminiscent of a burbling spring, before conjuring the sight of whistling mountains.

BackstoryDef.title: sect envoy
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for representing [PAWN_possessive] sect’s foreign policy in the eyes of other sects and human civilizations. [PAWN_pronoun] tried to uphold [PAWN_possessive] community’s face by brokering alliances and trade deals, while attempting to counter the schemes of [PAWN_possessive] sect’s enemies.

BackstoryDef.title: cultural ambassador
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A spokesperson for Yaoma culture, [PAWN_nameDef] shared [PAWN_possessive] xenotype’s traditions with other civilizations, raising interest in the Yaoma. [PAWN_pronoun] encouraged those [PAWN_pronoun] met to travel to their nearest sect, and often visited members of the Yaoma diaspora, tying foreign nations closer to [PAWN_possessive] people.

BackstoryDef.title: clan head
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With the succession of [PAWN_possessive] clan falling upon [PAWN_possessive] shoulders, [PAWN_nameDef] has stepped fully into the role of [PAWN_possessive] family’s head. Given the circumstances, [PAWN_pronoun] had to develop a keen understanding of politics, a plethora of advantageous relationships, and an aura of authority.

BackstoryDef.title: virtual idol
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed a social presence on the internet as an online entertainer. Under the persona of [PAWN_possessive] virtual avatar, [PAWN_pronoun] gathered a loyal following, who interacted with [PAWN_objective] as [PAWN_pronoun] completed various activities. These pursuits ranged from playing video games to introducing Yaoma culture.

BackstoryDef.title: traditionalist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Following in the footsteps of [PAWN_possessive] foremothers, [PAWN_nameDef] practiced many ancient Yaoma traditions to preserve them for posterity. [PAWN_pronoun] became a living record for many of these cultural artifacts, which included celebratory dances, traditional crafts, and culinary products. This conservatism, however, led [PAWN_nameDef] to neglect higher learning.

BackstoryDef.title: yaomese chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served up Yaoma cuisine for hungry patrons. Based on the specific style [PAWN_pronoun] practiced, [PAWN_pronoun] made use of cooking techniques and ingredients that enabled [PAWN_objective] to prepare appetizing food, enticing [PAWN_possessive] customers’ palates.

BackstoryDef.title: expeditionary surveyor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Once [PAWN_possessive] group established a bulwark in an unexplored region, it was [PAWN_nameDef]’s job to quantify and qualify the land. [PAWN_possessive] responsibilities involved immense amounts of travel, cataloging local fauna and flora as well as identifying local strategic areas. [PAWN_possessive] work enabled many Yaoma colonization efforts in foreign lands.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran mercenary
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] took part in various conflicts as a mercenary sanctioned by [PAWN_possessive] sect. [PAWN_pronoun] experience on the battlefield sharpened [PAWN_possessive] aim and survival instinct, allowing [PAWN_objective] to further promote [PAWN_possessive] sect’s foreign policy objectives. This continued presence spread Yaoma practices to far-flung lands.

BackstoryDef.title: tactician
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tried to resolve [PAWN_possessive] sect’s short-term logistical, military, and political issues. [PAWN_pronoun] consulted various resources to determine pragmatic approaches for these problems before delegating orders to [PAWN_possessive] subordinates, and was not afraid to conduct field research if required. This approach to problem solving and management underlined [PAWN_possessive] ability to act effectively and efficiently.

BackstoryDef.title: strategist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dealt with the long term planning of [PAWN_possessive] sect’s policies, advising leadership on how to execute various measures while accounting for their potential consequences. [PAWN_pronoun] supported these efforts by conducting extensive predictive analyses, synthesizing information about the current situation, its potential opportunities, and its risk areas. However, [PAWN_possessive] lofty position and theorycrafting habit isolated [PAWN_objective] from the drudgery involved with [PAWN_possessive] solutions.

BackstoryDef.title: blademaster
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] sought to return to a time where might and valor were closely intertwined. [PAWN_possessive] wanderings brought [PAWN_objective] to many a battlefield, where [PAWN_pronoun] spilled the blood of [PAWN_possessive] opponents in melee combat. Thus, [PAWN_pronoun] honed [PAWN_possessive] weapon’s arts at the detriment of [PAWN_possessive] aim.

BackstoryDef.title: array engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: With years of experience in the Yaoma defense industry, [PAWN_nameDef] was no stranger to constructing arrays, and proved [PAWN_possessive] capability at each stage of the building process from design to production. [PAWN_pronoun] had the engineering know-how for a variety of array engineering topics; this glut of knowledge assisted [PAWN_objective] with delivering arrays on time and in good condition.

BackstoryDef.title: martial trainer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Under [PAWN_possessive] tutelage, [PAWN_nameDef]’s students learned martial arts for self defense. In addition to educating young disciples on the Yaoma’s common curriculum, [PAWN_pronoun] taught classes on specialized martial arts, encouraging [PAWN_possessive] trainees to practice with a hands-on approach. The nature of [PAWN_possessive] work encouraged [PAWN_objective] to maintain [PAWN_possessive] fitness and combat prowess.

BackstoryDef.title: goldcrow sniper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] developed [PAWN_possessive] specialty in the long range elimination of high value targets, often from a concealed or elevated vantage point, during [PAWN_possessive] deployments. This single-minded focus on ballistics meant that [PAWN_possessive] almost never saw close combat. However, the extreme accuracy [PAWN_possessive] honed was honored with a prestigious commendation for [PAWN_possessive] marksmanship.

BackstoryDef.title: logistics officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a coordinator for the Yaoma, [PAWN_nameDef] verified the details of [PAWN_possessive] sect’s operations, whether it involved supplying disciples on tour or requisitioning materials for repairs. [PAWN_possessive] recordkeeping and organization ensured [PAWN_possessive] sect delivered goods on time, while minimizing delays in receiving and storing any imports.

BackstoryDef.title: covert operative
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] infiltrated various locations to conduct clandestine actions for [PAWN_possessive] sect, including sabotage and intelligence gathering. With a cover identity, along with other methods of deception, [PAWN_pronoun] attempted to complete [PAWN_possessive] objectives while avoiding detection, worming [PAWN_possessive] way into the good graces of others and discreetly disposing of [PAWN_possessive] targets.

BackstoryDef.title: influence agent
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Posted outside of the Yaoma’s direct sphere of influence, it was [PAWN_nameDef]’s role to sway public opinion in favor of [PAWN_possessive] sect- and by extension, the Yaoma. [PAWN_pronoun] coordinated with [PAWN_possessive] handlers to form relationships with powerful figures, organize events that increased Yaoma support, and bias discourse in favor of [PAWN_possessive] xenotype.
